headline: 1 Market-Beating Artificial Intelligence (AI) ETF That Could Turn $250,000 Into $1 Million
summary: The iShares Expanded Tech Sector ETF (NYSEMKT: IGM) has delivered a compound annual return of 10.3% since it was established in 2001, comfortably beating the S&P 500 (SNPINDEX: ^GSPC), which has generated an average annual gain of 7.8% over the same period (as of this writing).  Here's how the iShares ETF could turn $250,000 into $1 million over the long term.  The iShares Expanded Tech Sector ETF holds 283 different stocks, including most of the major players in the AI race.

headline: NFLX Q1: Management Emphasizes Content Investments and Ad Platform Expansion
summary: Streaming video giant Netflix (NASDAQ: NFLX) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 12.5% year on year to $10.54 billion. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $11.04 billion, close to analysts’ estimates. Its GAAP profit of $6.61 per share was 16.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: NFLX Q1: Management Emphasizes Content Investments and Ad Platform Expansion
raw.summary: Streaming video giant Netflix (NASDAQ: NFLX) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 12.5% year on year to $10.54 billion. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $11.04 billion, close to analysts’ estimates. Its GAAP profit of $6.61 per share was 16.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Tariff Turmoil: 1 Unstoppable Stock to Buy With $1,000 During the Nasdaq Bear Market
summary: Netflix (NASDAQ: NFLX), for instance, sells subscriptions to its streaming platform for access to movies and TV shows.  Netflix stock is only down 8.6% from its all-time high as of this writing, so it's doing far better than the broad market amid the recent turmoil.  Here's why investors with a spare $1,000 -- money they don't need for near-term expenses -- might want to invest in Netflix right now.
